content.detailedDescription:
I had just left my house to go out front to have a smoke. i was watching the stars and skies above the rooftop line of the houses across the street. from standing my my porch. facing south i seen what looked to be a fixed star not moving in any direction, shoot up into the sky and disappeared.
then about 5 to 7 seconds later. no sure if related but what looked like a shooting star appeared from lower right and shoot past to top left to where the first object disappeared. 
i thought i seen some sort of controlled craft because how or what could make the first thing move the way it did. the second object might just been a shooting star. i continued to watch for a little longer and no other objects were observed. 
i could not see the full sky at the time as there is a overhang on my porch that was obstructing the view of the sky above me. 
then i went inside
content.summary: Saw stationary light in sky and then shot upwards and disapeared

content.detailedDescription: I was warming up the car to pick up my mother from work.It was a quite night. i noticed to planes flying about 500 feet from each other i thought was odd. so i observed it more.The plane steered hard right as if something was wrong and the other object came towards me. we saw it wasn't from this world because it was very transparent and looked light fire was flowing though it. we was all amazed and shocked about it. i recorded it after it passed and it just creeped off so slow and quietly i saw it fly 10 miles out until it disappeared. i uploaded the video onto youtube under ufo flyover. you could hear me cursing because of the shock.
content.summary: 3 of us observed basically a chinese candle like craft fly silently over our head

content.detailedDescription: I use high quality canon 18x50 is image stabilized binoculars, and i am always looking in the sky. very common to watch satellites, this object acted exactly like a satellite. moved from one edge of the sky to the other, as much sky as you can see in an open area, similar to watching a satellite with binoculars. this object was triangular, and it was very high in the sky, this is why i keep stating satellites. moved as fast and identical to a satellite, so maybe it was a weird satellite, no idea. i know what i saw, it had 3 lights, one on each corner of the triangle, they were very dim. i very carefully observed this object for at least 10 seconds, maybe more. it moved from one side of the sky, to the other. could not be seen with the naked eye. if you know anything about canon image stabilized binoculars, you know what i am talking about. if you are interested in this sort of thing, i would recommend purchasing a pair. they are amazing. i know what i saw that night, i have never seen anything like it before, and since. triangle, lights on each corner, as high as a satellite, moving identical to a satellite. if you ever watched a satellite, just imagine if it was a triangle with 3 dim lights. pretty interesting i had to share! do we have anything here on earth like this? at least if it is, the public doesn't know about it!
content.summary: Identical to a satellite, from one side of the sky to the other, very high up

content.detailedDescription: my wife and went outside at dusk to have a smoke and check out the night sky,it had stopped raining / drizzling ,and i noticed a bright light in the east-se part of the sky.It was just sitting there,no wavering or bobbing like a craft,stationary like a star or planet,however there were clouds behind and wisps passing in front .I got the bnocs which i have strapped to a tripod and got a better look.Simply put it was a red-orange light ,all i could discern was ballish,perhaps spinning slowly.I went and got a camera phone but got discouraged by her and my inability to operate it.Soon it descended slowly out of sight in the direction of king road and horseshoe bar rd.During the observation i did have amoment where i felt like i shouldn't be looking at it andshrugged it off.Got on the cumputer this morning and can see that someone else had seen a white object that the reddish object had descended from.I feel it neccesary to share and learn more.
content.summary: Glowing light behaved odd, looked at through binoculars,saw red-orange orb.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving northbound on route 130 heading home at around 10pm. as i got near to the off ramp for the betsy ross bridge i noticed 3 yellow lights northwest of where i was in the shape of a triangle. at first i thought maybe someone had set off fireworks as the lights were brighter, more yellow and larger than i am used to seeing with the planes on their landing path to philadelphia international. i then saw that the lights were not moving and were in the shape of an equilateral type triangle. i then started to see the lights move. they started to move towards each other, almost as if dancing. in the time it took me to look back at traffic and back up, they were moving into the shape of a right triangle, and continued to move into an isosceles triangle. by this point i had tried to set up my phone to see if it could record anything, which 
i believe it did.  as i got closer to the local shoprite i thought it was over, it was obvious it was further away to the north and west, maybe over the delaware river.  a couple of seconds later the lights disappeared.  at this point i wasn't feeling anything besides the normal sense of wonder at what i had seen. as i continued on to the rest of my short drive home i was pulling up to the jughandle to get to my street and i saw them again, further north and west. as i was waiting for the traffic light to turn green i started to feel uncomfortable. i wanted to get home and get someone else to see the lights so i didn't feel so crazy. after i pulled up to my house because of the trees around i could no longer see the lights, i could hear a helicopter though.  i had to take a bag in the house and come back out for something, and when i stepped back out it was unnaturally calm in the area.  i could't hear traffic from route 130 or anything. as i grabbed what i came out for i could see the lights moving south through the trees. i also started to hear what sounded like snapping branches and footsteps through the leaves on the ground. i was terrified by this point and got in my house as fast as i could.  for the video, it was shot on an iphone 6, and i think i got a shot of it around the 11 second mark, but i could be wrong
content.summary: Saw three yellow lights in the distance, what appeared to be over a local grocery store at first, as i was on my way home

content.detailedDescription:
I first witnessed a single bright light hovering in place. it had lights flashing in a linear pattern. the lights were red, green, blue, and white. it hovered for 5 minutes then began to dim out. as it started to dim out a second brightly lit craft came into view and then the first one became extremely bright again. the two bright crafts hovered there for about a minute before the second one started moving up and to the southeast before abruptly changing direction and quickly flying to the west before disappearing.

as the craft disappeared the original craft began to dim again. after it dimmed another craft became visible. when the newly visible craft got to the altitude of the original craft it brightened back up. they hovered there together for about a minute until the newly visible craft took off in the same flight pattern as the previous craft. 

after the previous craft disappeared another craft appeared and the two crafts that were visible began hovering together and then they would move up and down at the same time. one took off in the same path as the previous two and as that one disappeared the final one took off in the same path and faded out. 

there were four crafts in total. the picture only shows two but no more than two were visible at a time. 

while all of it was going on they crafts were completely quiet.
content.summary: A single light hovering in the sky then accompanied by a second. four objects viewed in total
It was the brigthest ligth in a early nitgh sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside,,can,t remember what i was doing? but started to my front door and looked up and seen something with lights on it,,comeing strate at me,,but,couldn,t tell what it was,,there was no sound at all,,,i called to my family and had them come and look,,we all seen it,,,it came closer and stoped right above our home,,,no sound,,no noise at all,,,it looked like it was right on top of us,,but,,i think it was a couple of hundred feet or so,,it was big,,lights all over it,,we all looked at it for some time,,you could hear the bugs making noise ,,but not a sound from it,,it turned and when east,,slow at frist then faster,,,we then heard aircraft,,plane and chopper,s,,,they looked like they was following it,,,,,we all seen it and didn,t want to tell anyone,,we know how people are looked on for saying anything,,but we just couldn,t not say anything,,,so we desided to write you..We can draw it,,if you like?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A ufo stoped above our home

content.detailedDescription:
About 2015 05 10 23 h time zone europe/vilnius jonava city i stand on a balcony ( 5th floor ) and i saw a pulsating star. the star pulsated silver and pink colors. after 30 s this star sides turned on 4 lights. of these lights created triangle of 5 lights. the surface was not seen only lights.
 as soon  it was light on, the triangle at once high speed flew from south to north. no sound and other interference. speed was very very fast. 
  the flight path was straight.
  schema object : 

                0
             0
           0
             0
                0
content.summary: The triangle object flew very quickly

content.detailedDescription: On any given clear night you can often see ufos, i consider them ufos because they are mostly just hovering but they do move from time to time. they usually come in multiples and group up into 3s. there is usually one craft that glows much brighter and tends to be in the se sky, they will just hover there all night many times but last night a jet went near that bright craft and all the sudden every one of the crafts began moving toward the nw at the same time. these crafts are up and down cylinders with flashing lights of white, red, green, and blue. but they can make their lights be all of one color as well.
content.summary: 5+ crafts hovering then jet went near one and every craft began nw path for a period then later returned to original positions.

content.detailedDescription: I was on break at work setting in my truck smoking. i noticed a light off in the distance i had never seen before. working here for 5 years i know the sky line like the back of my hand so i watch for abnormal things in the sky all the time. when i looked out i saw this very bright white light that seemed to grow brighter every few moments then dim a little. i thought it might be a visible star getting ready to blow or something along those lines. after a few minutes the ball of light flashed a little brighter and out of the white ball a small gold light ejected from it's bottom part. it almost looked like a spark coming off of it, but it traveled up just a bit and out to its left side from my direction of view. then the gold ball stopped there and turned a deep red color and wasn't as bright. i watched it for another fifteen or so minutes. the whole time both balls stayed in the exact same spot. the little red ball from time to time would flash a bright white light then go back to its almost a blackish red. the whole time my radio kept fuzzing out and going to complete static on a station i never have issues with. the whole time i was just mesmerized by it. i've only ever seen something like this when i was young so it was kind of exhilarating. it was still in the sky when i headed in from my break at 3:45am. i pointed it out to a co-worker heading to his car. he said the same thing, that he had never seen that before in the sky and he had been here fifteen years. we both know there is no power lines, radio towers, or any type of light in that area at all. the only light out in the tree line is from one of those plane towers that blink red and the object i saw was about half a mile away from it.
content.summary: Bright white light that ejected small red light

content.detailedDescription: Two large round disc shape flying dull lights on bottom and traveling at incredible speed next to each other in a westerly direction. no sound or blinking or colored lights were observed. first observed straight overhead and observed for about 5 seconds as they faded out traveling to western horizon. they appeared to slowly turn as it was not straight line but were turning slowly to the right before they faded out into sky. these two discs seemed to be the same thing i saw couple years ago from same location. i have submitted another sighting from same location couple years ago when 2 large discs were observed flying at incredible speed along edge of cloud bank while still light out traveling sse that were definetely large round grey discs flying next to each other with darker panel type parts on bottom traveling from horizon to horizon along with 30 second sighting of 3 golden lights traveling together with lead light traveling straight line while 2 lights behind were swooping around each other behind. the lights on tonights ufo's were very dim but reason i noticed them. a shooting star was observed about 8 seconds after discs were observed just north of their path of travel.
content.summary: Two round dull lighted vehicles flying at incredible speeds straight over traveling westerly and fading out

content.detailedDescription:
Driving southwestward on blue star highway in sw michigan. saugatuck was the nearest town. lake michigan as the crow flies, less than five miles. 

between 5 and 5:30pm, daylight. low and near enough to see if it was plane, helicopter or drone. it was not. almost egg shaped, reflective metal sparkling in the sky. no plane wings, no helicopter and not a drone at that height.

it was there roughly 15 to 20 seconds, upward and ahead of me. i was not gaining ground on it, so it was moving but not fast.

glimpsed up and down a number of times, i needed to keep part of my focus on driving. on third or fourth glimpse, it was gone...
content.summary: Took place between 5 and 5:30pm, daylight. there was light traffic - blue star highway, traveling south between holland and saugatuck - closer to saugatuck.

content.detailedDescription: About 1973 or 74. i was about 8 years old in the back yard with my mom,(no clouds in the sky). she said look at that. it was round, patchy, white, like the moon,with a aura type glow. i told my mom, that's the moon. she said no, the moon is over there. i said oh, your right. it started getting bigger faster. my mom got panicked and said, quick go get your father. i ran inside the house looking all over for him. i couldn't find him. when i came back out my mom looked like a ghost, (in a shocked state) i could still see the shape a little bigger in a more southeastern location, i could see it start getting smaller and rising. i asked my mom what happened, she told me(on my mothers grave)" it got as big as a football field" i couldn't imagine this happened in the short time i was in the house. i watched with my mother as it darted different directions on an instant, and then shot off and vanished, my mom died of terminal cancer all throughout her body two years later. i always wondered if there was a connection.I will never forget that night.
content.summary: Looked just like moon, but moon was in another place, it came close fast, and shot off, changing sharp directions,

content.detailedDescription: Recently i began seeing the objects in groups of 7-10, at first appearing as stars, but then very obviously moving slowly in up and down and back and forth. sometimes moving in sync with one another. sometimes making short darting movements. they seem to hover in the same general space. they do not move over long distances. when they make an upward motion it is liken to the motion of a jellyfish. they seem to change glow from white to red, but not a consistent blink as an airplane would be. some of them remain the same with only a white glow. it has gotten to the point that i cannot find a "star" that isn't making the same motion. i gave up on watching individual bodies of "stars" that wouldn't move in very obvious ways. every heavenly body i focus on undeniably moves. i watch the sky every night. i have for years. i know how stars and the night sky should appear. stars don't move. i took the approach to look for constellations. i found pleiades. i was relieved until it literally rearranged itself and dispersed, almost as if intentionally. there are legions of them, all across the sky.   it's been going on for 2 nights now. i'm seeing it from my yard. i smoke and watch the sky. i don't believe it myself and have no explanation. if there is some other rational or logical explanation i would gladly accept it. i live in a rural wooded area. i had to put it out there somewhere, somehow, so i'm reporting it here. i hope and pray with sincerity that this information will be useful for some good cause, regardless if it offers me any explanation or not. i state the above with complete and total honesty and integrity.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light orbs moving in sky by the thousands, appearing as stars

content.detailedDescription: Both my children described the same object, my son lives with me an my daughter lives with her mother, my daughter said she saw a strange object oct 29th, 2015 at roughly 10 pm eastern standard time while she was laying in her bed looking out thr window, she said looked like a star but brighter, looked like realy bright glitter, and was twirling around, then she said she fell asleep, my son woke up oct 30th 2015 at 6 am to deliver his news papers and also described the same bright object in the sky, that would mean the object was in the sky for at least about 8 hours.
content.summary: Star like object in the sky.. sparkled and twirled.

content.detailedDescription: When my wife and i checked the  trail cam pictures we saw what looks like a air rod  i saw on a documentary program a couple of years ago pretty wild in the same area we have had orbs of light different times but i never really thought much about it until now  please take a look and see what you all think
content.summary: I found this picture on my trail cam looks like a air rod i seen on a documentary program

content.detailedDescription: At work. looking at the stars and saw large bright yellow stars moving. reminded me of a stealth bomber, thought it was related to a stealth bomber. the lights sort of shook and it moved across the sky. i was surprised. it wen out of my field of vision.
content.summary: Looked like check mark shaped craft.3 lights on one side, 2 on other.

content.detailedDescription: I and another individual observed this star moving  westward for a distance then a 90 degree turn to north an equal distance then reverse itself for a distance and repeatedly making 90 degree turns square like for about a minute or two before accelerating off and disappearing. these were all very quick movements. i thought maybe it might have been a maneuvering of a satellite. what could this be if it wasn't a satellite.
content.summary: Same as stars

content.detailedDescription: World series game 5 citi field, flushing ny approx. 10 pm est 11/1/15 facing west saw a green glowing object in sky above stadium moving west to north and quickly disappeared. my son standing next to me turned to me and was about to say something and i interrupted and asked "did you see that?" he responded in the affirmative. the next day i googled to see if there were any other witnesses since we were at a game with 45,000 people but couldn't find any reported sightings.
content.summary: World series game 5 facing west saw a green glowing object in sky moving west to north and quickly disappeared. i hadn't consumed alcohol during game.

content.detailedDescription: Closing back bedroom window saw an orange orb with a small red light about to the rear and left on a southwest to northeast trajectory.Orbs appeared more in a floating action fluctuating west and east till building blocked further veiw.Propulsion is an unsurity.No contrail or visible exsahaust of propulsion system.I told my wife your not going to beleive this but you'll miss this one,knowing my wife is afraid of these things.Once again felt some cautious exhilliration,i am unsure which ones they where this time.
content.summary: Orange orb from soutwest to northeast trajectory small red light or orb directly to the southwest

content.detailedDescription: Me and my husband on our back deck looking northwest, saw something fly across the sky..Slower than a meteor and very bright and seemed close but still moving fast. off to the left saw a bright orange glow then fade away and a few minutes later we saw one after another of solid lights moving in all different directions above us, 5 total and two of them actually went right by each other parallel and then they all faded away. all in the same area. about 10 minutes later we saw another light just start moving away over the big dipper and then about 5 minutes after all of that our lights in the house and street light that i see from the back deck across the street flickered a few times. the neighbors homes did not.
content.summary: Multiple lights going in different directions at the same time

content.detailedDescription: 10-22-15 9:30 pm est. i was standing in my yard. i noticed something coming from the east. as it got more above me i could see it in more detail. triangle craft, dark. 3 large white circular lights in a triangle pattern. 1 light in the center of the 3 (same size) slowly pulsating red to white and back. it was like the red was melding with the white, as it changed the 2 colors back and forth. very slowly, approx. 2 seconds. as i watch it pass me, i noticed something at the front of it. grayish white rectangular bent light in front of it. it looked to me as if it was manipulating the atmosphere directly in front of it, producing this grayish white flickering. it made no sound until it was traveling off to the west. not jet engine sound. like a low rumble of distant thunder. which also led me to believe it was manipulating the atmosphere around it. it travelled in a straight line path east to west horizon to horizon. it was never abstructed from my view. approx. 5 minutes. i am from dayton, ohio. i lived next to wright-patterson air force base, for 23 years. i know what planes and jets look like. someone told me to look up, tr3b on youtube. it shows some similar type crafts. i don't know if it was alien or of the government. either way, some high-tech stuff. it was hard for me to judge the size of it, or the height in the sky. it was pretty big. mid-level in the sky. all of the lights were on the bottom, not the sides. no faa signal lights what so ever. that's about the best i can describe it.
content.summary: Triangle craft, 3 large white lights in a triangle and 1 in center slowly pulsating red & white. same size.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog 11/2/15 @ 1830 hrs. very clear night, sunset was 5:21, clear and dark sky's. i live 30 miles east of downtown cleveland in the suburbs, with some street lights around and houselights. 

looked nnw at the big dipper, nne at cassiopeia, the crooked "w", and a little further east looking ne about 45 degrees, a bright yellow/orange glowing object slowly descended about 5 degrees, for about 3 minutes, remained stationary about 1 minute, began ascending and became orange, then red, loosing brightness, then faded and disappeared. 

brightest magnitude was 5 - 10 times venus magnitude in the morning sky. also 5-10 times larger than venus at her brightest. could easily judge descent and assent on well star light night. one or two light aircraft with red/green marker lights and normal engine noise in the same general direction, observed other passenger jet aircraft with dim white strobe lights at cruising altitude in different directions. 

do not believe this to be aircraft or helicopter traffic, never observed those with lights of these colors. distance difficult to judge. should note that i live not too far from lake erie shoreline, which does run nne. also, about 20 miles nne from my location is the perry nuclear power plant. coincidence, maybe?
content.summary: Bright orange slowly desending light

content.detailedDescription: Monday october 19 at 4:30 am, my girlfriend and i were heading home from a friends house.  we were on a long stretch of highway near a national wildlife reserve so it was very dark and no other traffic or lights from any homes or businesses   we noticed that an object right above the tree line to our left was flying next to us,  our speed was 65 headed west.  the object would turn all lights out fly ahead and over us (have the video)  swoop over the trees down to the highway level close to the back of my suv and start to turn all different colors and lights almost like it was trying to look like a car behind us. this went on for 10 to 15 miles and we would just watch and speed up then slow down just to see how they may be tracking us.  about half way through the 45-50 min ride home we noticed that it was two behind us and at one time possibly three.   the movement of all were very quick and rapid constantly changing colors and then shutting off all lights.   as we were getting closer to the town we past two highway street lights blinking red (because of the time of morning) and two caution yellow lights that were blinking ahead of the intersection to warn you to stop for the upcoming traffic light.   when the objects past these lights still behind us they would try to emulate the color and timing of the lights   as we moved away from the intersection we noticed that the two caution yellow blinking lights were getting closer and closer two us.  they were obviously trying to blend in and not seem as noticeable.   we saw one fly from the highway over the trees and flew extremely fast ahead of us,   when we made it up the road about two miles i noticed a red blinking light hovering to my left about 40 ft in the air and it was blinking like a cell phone tower about 100 yards away it just monitored us as we drove by.   we were now getting into town where there are  houses businesses and lots more light and street lights .   they continued to follow at a slight distance behind but still very noticeable for us to see all there rapid movements and color change.   as we were getting closer to the city and the street lights we noticed that not all but a good portion of the street lights were brighter than we've ever seen them before,  so bright that you couldn't hardly look at them  we were getting close to home  and the same activity around us was still going on we made note of a street lamp very close to home that we passed hundreds of times that was so bright that you couldn't look directly at it.   we didn't want to go home ( i guess we didn't want them to know where we lived or something) so we turned around and headed back in the same direction we came from and we didn't see them again and we also made note that the street lights that were so bright before were now back to normal and some not even on.  that was our experience,  i'm attaching photos taken from the trip.  i couple of the photos i changed the exposure on to see the image better.  none of the images were changed or tampered with.  the video was to large to load.  the last image was supposedly from nasa but the dates match up with mine so....
content.summary: Followed / chased on highway, at times high speeds   lots of directional changes

content.detailedDescription: It was the night (almost 9pm) before i was leaving for work offshore and i decided to go for a walk at the park down the street. while i was walking i was watching all the aiplanes and helicopters flying around. i live a 15 minute drive from downtown houston, texas so there is quite a bit of air traffic around here. it was a clear night, not a cloud in sight. i was making my way around the walking path, which is a big oval, when i noticed what i thought was an airplane flying pretty low and not on any normal course ive ever seen them flying. it was just the yellow/orange glow of the front light the planes use. i didnt see any flashing lights on it but the direction it looked like it was coming, i wouldnt have been able to see them until it got closer because it was coming directly towards me. after about 20 seconds or so i stopped walking because it didnt look like it was moving and i thought it might just be because i was walking that i couldnt tell. it had to be about a minute of standing there that i noticed it was not moving but just sitting there. i had my phone in my pocket and was hesitant of pulling it out because of how long it takes for the camera to start up on it and i didnt want to take my eyes of it. after about 20 more seconds of thinking about it i decided i was going to try to film it anyway but as soon as i went to reach in my pocket the light just dimmed out and nothing was there. it was just like the light shrunk until there was nothing there. so weird. i started my camera and stayed at the park for about 30 more minutes hoping to see it again, or anything else, but i didnt. ive lived here my whole 36 years ive been alive and i have seen every kind of plane, helicopter and even the new drones. this was none of them. the area it was over is an industrial area with chemical plants along the port of houston. the light was brighter than all the planes so thats why it stuck out to me at first. it also looked like it was coming towards me but then just stopped and sat there. im back home now and im walking the park every night hoping to see something again, this time with my camera.
content.summary: Ufo mimicking airplanes

content.detailedDescription:
I donâ€™t know anymore the exact date of my sighting, but it must be between the 8th and 11th of january 2011 in the night. i stayed near las terrenas/ samana in a hotel and was sitting on the balcony.I looked to the nice little mountains in front of our balcony. suddently the two rectangular, grey/silver shaped objects in the sky came from the south and they flew fast, perfect side by side, but both with the same steady speed, with no noise in a northerly direction. they look two dimensional, like two big sheets of paper. that looked very unreal, because such an perfectly side by side flight, you can only see in movies with computer animation. i lost the sighting after the objects were passing our hotel, because i could look in the south direction, but not to the north.

a short moment before there was a plane flying from north to a southerly direction with position lights. the plane was in a high in altitude and was against the two objects, only a small point in the sky. maybe the pilots saw the same, i donâ€™t know.

i couldnâ€™t believe that there wasn't clouds in the sky. i donâ€™t know what it could be. thatâ€™s all i could say.
content.summary: Two silver/grey shaped objects flying side by side.

content.detailedDescription:
Cleveland east side: november 2nd 2015    between 4:20 and 4:35 pm in the northeast sky i witnessed a ufo for 15 minutes. i was in my backyard, and my husband was able to run in house for binoculars.  what i saw was not a plane and not a helicopter. it was triangular and had 3 circular illuminations near each corner. the circular shape of illuminations were definitive. no colored lights. they were clear bright illuminations.   it was able to hover in same place and several times in that 15 minutes, it was able to do complete turns while staying in same place. it was high in the sky, but binoculars allowed me to see much better detail.   no linear movement like a plane.  it was an incredibly clear afternoon sky. the "craft" was very high in the sky. no noise, no trails.  it then then went higher and a bit north.
  husband (amateur astronomer & owns telescope) saw it with the binoculars as well. he was miffed and agreed it was not any kind of aircraft he has ever witnessed before. 

  initially,i viewed the unusual light in the sky for several minutes. it did not move. never saw anything like that happen.  that's when my husband ran in the house to get the binoculars. that is how we were able to see the definitive shape and the 3 definitive circular illuminations on its underside.
 i was trying to make sense of what i was seeing through the binoculars, but i have no rational explanation. it was something i had never seen before, and i felt fortunate that we were able to get a better clear view of it through the binoculars.
content.summary: Had access to binoculars after observing stationary bright object in sky from my backyard. binoculars showed definitive triangular shape with 3 lights.

content.detailedDescription: While heading north bound on route 117 (north rd.), i observed two orange oblong lights hovering right at tree level above the pohegnut reservoir. i initially assumed that it was a very low flying plane until i came to a stop at a traffic light and saw them ascend very slowly at different speeds. i then thought they were helicopters so i rolled down my window and heard no noise. the traffic signal turned green so i moved my vehicle through the intersection and pulled off to the side of the road hoping to get a video. by the time i had my phone available and prepared to record, the objects were gone.
content.summary: Two orange oblong lights hovering above the reservoir

content.detailedDescription: El pasado viernes 30 de octubre a las 11:29 am me encontraba fotografiando un halo solar. al estar analizando las imágenes me he percatado de que en una de ellas se presentan tres objetos inusuales, los cuales perecen estar a distintas altitudes. por favor me gustaría que me dieran su opinión sobre dichos objetos, si son simplemente insectos, aves o posiblemente ovnis.
content.summary: Presencia de tres objetos a distintas altitudes en halo solar
